comments.author: CyPmascota

top_comment.text:
He escuchado lo mismo por internet o leído q si hay mas de un hamster en 
una jaula pueden herirse y hasta comerse ... A mi me paso q tuve dos de los 
sirios... y duraron tiempo juntos, pero un dia uno de ellos apareció 
abierto, naturalmente estaba muerto... con el tiempo he logrado creer q en 
algo falle para motivar al otro hamster para q le atacara. Por otra parte 
hace poco tuve una de otra raza, era de los mas chiquitos creo. Y la verdad 
q no me fue mal, pero honestamente no solo le daba pienzo de hamster, pues 
le daba de todo, en cantidades pequeñas... como algunas frutas, vegetales y 
hasta huevo un trocito y carne también un poquito... se subía a la jaula 
emocionada jijijijii La adore a mi Mamut, ahora ella esta en el cielo... 
pero a mi también me gustan mucho los hamsters... Saludos y gracias x el 
vídeo.﻿
top_comment.author: Rommy Cballeero

comments.text:
Indudablemente no quisiera que quizás vean personas como yo. Sin embargo me 
encantaría poder ser como otras personas q admiro, pero disto mucho de 
parecerme a ellos. ( A veces pese a todo si pueden servirme de inspiración) 
....Salu2!
comments.author: Rommy Cballeero

comments.text:
Que bonito +Rommy Cballeero , ojalá hubiera más personas como tú!
Un saludo.
comments.author: CyPmascota

comments.text:
+CyPmascota Bueno no se, pero a mi hamster q era hembrita y se llama por 
cierto Mamutt .... pues le encantaba, se colgaba en las rejitas de su 
jaulita y esperaba a que le alcance algún pedacito. Igual y cosas picantes 
u dependiendo muy asidas o pescados si que noooo. Pero ella ni bien sentía 
olor a comida, pedía se colgaba y estaba atenta a que le ponga algún 
pedacito que se lo devoraba ..... Se gano mi corazón y espero haberme 
ganado la confianza de por si mi hamster. Ya que para mi ganarme la 
confianza de un animal es mucho y un milagro. A los humanos ellos nos ven 
con recelo a veces. A diferencia de los perritos q es mas sencillo generar 
empatia. Pero las aves, peces, roedores y incluso me parece hasta caballos, 
etc les toma tiempo irlos domesticando por decirlo así a que aprendan a 
convivir con el ser humano. Ahora ella, esta allá arriba en el cielo como 
un lucero mas q tengo en las alturas ;D Salu2!!!!
comments.author: Rommy Cballeero

comments.text:
Hola Rommy,
Dar una gran variedad de alimentos en pocas cantidades, les beneficia 
mucho. Bien hecho!!!
Un saludo.
comments.author: CyPmascota

comments.text:
Dale tiempo. Tiene que acostumbrarse a ti y tú a él. Sitúa su jaula encima 
de la mesa o en algún lugar alto para que pueda verte y se familiarice con 
tu presencia. Dale snacks o comida directamente desde tu mano, háblale 
bajito, obsérvalo. Tienes que acercarte a él poco a poco, sin estresarlo. A 
ver qué tal funciona.

captions.text: Subscribe to our english channel: Everything about your pet!
https://www.youtube.com/user/allaboutyourpet
I have brought home
a bunch of hamsters and I want to show you how to prepare them the ideal cage.
The thing is that the hamsters don't need much space, If you are
going to have only one, a small cage of about 30 by 20 centimeters
is enough, but I love hamsters and I have brought a big bunch.
So I am going to prepare them a huge house
with two floors so they really feel comfortable.
Here it is.
I have already filled it with hay, with all small mammals
specially the first days, you have to fill in with a lot of hay so
they can hide and look for quite spaces, as these are animals very
susceptible to stress.
Right, I have the cage filled in with hay
and now I want to show you the other things I will also
put inside.
The feed, obviously has to be hamster feed and I will
place some
on the second floor
just because the first days
I want them to find food easily.
Then I will place food everywhere.
It will be much easier for them to
find food wherever they are.
So I'm going to spread some all over the cage
the final feeding place will be only on the second floor.
Hay is very important and we will fill in some more
because we will use it for two functions.
One used as a hiding place,
And two, obviously used as food.
I will place it under the stairs, I always like to give them more than one
flavour so they can eat the one they like best.
Good, perfect,
I am giving the hamster a very important thing for their nest,
it is a bedding called Sweet Dreams.
There are two types that you can use:
a type of paper bedding
that they use for filling in their nest
or also a type of cotton.
Let's place the
Sweet Dreams paper bedding under the stairs.
It is where I want them to make their nest
and have their bed.
Nice, perfect.
Hamsters have to eat some veggies too.
Be careful with the fruit, not too much.
But you can give them some green leaves every day
I'm going to give them a plate full
because I have quite a few of them
and I know they really love veggies.
Perfect. What else? Of couse, yes, I have to talk about the temperature
The first days at home, the temperature has to be between 25 and 27 degrees
specially now because they are still babies
and they are not with their mummy and so.
Whenever you can, have a few hamsters,
it is much better. Hamsters get along fairly well
provided that they have always been bred since babies, the real thing is that the males
don't get along very well, and they don't accept a new male
So if you have a few, try to have a bunch of females
and only one male. Be very careful because if you have
lots of males and females together you will have a great hamster empire
in a very short time, because they are animals that reproduce themselves in a very exgerated manner
Just leave them alone the first 2 or 3 days
I know that when you get home, you are wanting to pick them up and play with them
Don¡t, leave them in the cage at least for 2, 3 or 4 days
even up to a week.
Also snacks, I know you love to give them snacks, sweets,
there are many of these in the market. Don't use them at the beginning, because they like them very much
and they would eat too many, and this is not good for them either.
So you must wait, I hope that you have learnt a lot with this video, I hope you
enjoy them, personally I love hamsters, I like them very much
and they will not steel you much time. See you.

title: HÁMSTERS - El primer día del hámster en casa
